description: Small saboteur groups infiltrated Ukrainian defensive lines, weakened by a shortage of troops. President Volodymyr Zelensky said Russian infantry 'have advanced about 10 kilometers,' without using armored vehicles.

Moroccan feminist activist Ibtissame 'Betty' Lachgar faces prosecution for 'insulting Islam'
description: Moroccan authorities have requested the pretrial detention of the activist after she posted a photo deemed critical of Islam. For wearing a T-shirt with the words 'Allah is lesbian,' she faces up to five years in prison.

headline: Israeli Air Force veterans protest occupation of Palestinian enclave
description: Nearly 500 retired and reserve members of the Israeli Air Force gathered in front of the army headquarters in Tel Aviv on Tuesday, demanding an end to the fighting and the return of hostages still held by Hamas.

headline: Mexico extradites 26 people accused of drug trafficking to the United States
description: Under pressure from Donald Trump to combat fentanyl, Mexico is speeding up the extradition of drug traffickers.

headline: The despair of Gaza's last prosthetics makers
description: Only nine technicians remain in the Palestinian enclave who can make or adapt prosthetics, while nearly 4,000 people, including 10% of children, have undergone amputations.

description: Fourteen departments are under red alert on Tuesday and two-thirds of the country are under orange alert. Temperature records have been broken in southwest France.

headline: Netanyahu finds himself besieged from all sides
description: After Thursday's announcement that Israel will gradually occupy Gaza, the prime minister now faces intense pressure, particularly from the far right, leading many observers to question whether his coalition will last until its scheduled end in October 2026.

headline: 'The Naked Gun': The refreshing return of a heroic fool with Liam Neeson
description: This contemporary revival of the iconic franchise stars the actor as an incompetent cop and delivers the same bad taste that defined the original saga.
